my stomach still feels bloated. I'm just going to settle for coffee this morning.
What are you going to have?（50）
M: I am starved. I am going to order the continental breakfast.
W: Wow, you really do have an appetite, don't you? I mean, I don't
understand how you can eat as much as you do yet keep yourself so thin like
that. You are so lucky.（51）
M: Well, I guess I have always digested my food very fast. （52）I've
been thin for as long as I can remember. Actually, when I was younger, my wish
was to gain some weight. In fact, I remember eating 5 meals a day during high
school just to gain some weight, but I didn't have any luck.
W：我昨晚在自助餐馆一定是吃多了，胃到现在还觉得胀。今天早晨我
就勉强喝点咖啡吧。你打算吃点什么？
M：我饿极了。我打算去点欧式早餐。
W：哇，你很有胃口嘛，是吧？我是说，我不理解为什么你吃这么多，
还能保持那么瘦。你真是幸运。
M：嗯，我想也许是因为我总是消化得非常快。我打记事儿起就一直很
瘦。实际上，当我更年轻的时候，我的愿望是增加点儿体重。事实上，我记
得在高中时一天吃五顿饭来增肥，但我没那么幸运。

Questions 71 through 73 refer to the following talk.
Today is the first workday of the new year, and we'd like to start off with
a very positive resolution, especially as we have twenty new staff members
beginning today.（71）Our company has always been heavily involved in
volunteer work. We have several teams of volunteers, each of which specializes in
a different area. Please join one of the clubs and participate in their special
activities.（73）We'd like all members to remember that service to others can be
surprisingly fun and rewarding. Our receptionist, Jo Workman,（72）who is
also the leader of the environmental action team, has prepared a handbook on
volunteering and other social activities. Please get a copy, and don't hesitate to
join.（73）

Questions 74 through 76 refer to the following news report.
The East York Juniors Soccer Club is launching a membership and fund-
raising drive to start off the new season.（74）The club's secretary has told our
local sports reporter that the club may be forced to close this year due to
financial problems.（75）He would like to encourage all parents to consider the
benefits to children and the community by supporting the local soccer club, which
has been working in this community for the last sixty years. The annual membership
fee has been raised to forty dollars in order to cover the cost of maintaining club
facilities. The club is also seeking volunteers to work as officials and umpires.
Anyone with first aid or coaching experience is most welcome to join the
coaching team.（76）
东约克青少年足球俱乐部正在发展会员制和进行筹款活动来开始新的赛
季。俱乐部秘书告诉我们当地的体育记者，由于财政问题，俱乐部今年也许
会被迫关闭。他鼓励所有的家长考虑孩子们及社区的利益，支持这个已经在
该社区服务60年的地方足球俱乐部。年会费增加了40美元，以便支付维护和

Questions 77 through 79 refer to the following talk.
Congratulations on your choice of a Xenox PDP-alpha laser fax, copier and
printer. All Xenox products incorporate the latest technology into attractive,
versatile, and durable office equipment. This instruction manual will demonstrate
clearly how to assemble, install, and use your new Xenox-alpha. As a first step,
（77）please ensure that you have a clear space that is large enough and has
electrical and computer cable access. （79）Next, in the package labeled ‘A’,
you will find a training video, warranty documents, and after-sales service
information.（78）The video is designed for staff training. Please take the time to
view it in order to get the best out of your new copier and to avoid costly damage
due to incorrect use. Now, let's open package ‘B’, and begin assembly.

设备。这一安装手册将清楚地说明如何组装、安装及使用您的新Xenox-
alpha。第一步，请保证您有足够大的畅通空间，并有电源和电脑接线。接

Questions 80 through 82 refer to the following talk.
In an important move today, the Board of Directors announced that their
search for a new CEO has been successful.（80）We are pleased to announce
that Mr. Michael Benwick, one of the most respected business leaders in
Europe, has accepted the position.（81）Mr. Benwick has had a far-ranging
and highly successful career in industry in South Africa and the United
Kingdom. After graduating from Oxford in 1965, he took a middle
management position in South Africa's mining industry. From there he has
never looked back.（82）We welcome him not only for his dynamism and
charisma but also for his wealth of experience.
在今天的一项重要提议中，董事会宣布他们成功地找到了新首席执行
官。我们很高兴地宣布迈克尔·本维克先生接受了这一职位，他是欧洲最受
尊敬的商业领袖之一。本维克先生在南非和英国的职业生涯涉及范围很广
泛，而且非常成功。1965年从牛津毕业以后，他在南非煤矿业获得了一个中
层管理职位。从那开始他一直蒸蒸日上。我们欢迎他的到来，不仅仅是因为
他的干劲儿和领袖魅力，也是因为他拥有非常丰富的经验。

Questions 83 through 85 refer to the following broadcast.
Welcome to Earthbeat, your top-rated, environmental radio program.
（83）First, let's go to the news. We have some sad news to announce today. The
federal government has decided to discontinue funding for environmental science
on ABC Radio. This will mean that Earthbeat will no longer be broadcast after
the last program in this series airs in November.（84）A government
spokesperson said, however, that funding will be increased for pure science and
business reporting. Let's move to our first special report. We have in our studio a
very special guest: it's Amy McIntyre,（85）the distinguished botanist and
author of several prize-winning books on the flora of New Guinea. She'll be talking
to our reporter, Jim Cross.

ABC广播的环境科学类节目。这将意味着“地球的心跳”将在11月系列广播的

Questions 89 through 91 refer to the following talk.
Good morning. I would like to welcome all of the 8 trainee chefs from the
Food Science and Technology College this morning.（89）We hope your stay
here will be profitable. I should also mention that our chain of restaurants
regularly employs young graduates from your college.（90）So, we'll be
watching you, and if any of you are interested in future employment with us, please
let us know. You may not be aware that our chain has restaurants in all the major
cities of England and Europe. We have also recently opened restaurants in India,
Southeast Asia, China, and Japan. We encourage overseas work experience as a
way of developing exciting cooking styles. So working with us can be a fabulous
experience if you have the right attitude. So, let's get busy. Please check the
notice board to find out which team you have been assigned to.（91）

们的连锁店在英国和欧洲所有的主要城市都有分布。最近我们还在印度、东

会。让我们开始工作吧。请看告示牌以便确认你们被分在哪个组。
